name: Truewind
headline: AI-powered Bookkeeping and Finance Software
description:
⛵️ Truewind (YC W23) is AI-powered bookkeeping and finance software for startups.

🤖 Using GPT-3, Truewind captures the business context that only founders have, making accounting easier and more accurate. Through a combination of AI and concierge service, Truewind delivers a delightful financial back office experience, that includes:

+ Reliable bookkeeping with less errors
+ Detailed financial models
+ Built exclusively for startups
+ Fast, responsive expertise
tags: industry:fintech; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area
generated_description:
Truewind is a San Francisco-based startup that’s transforming bookkeeping and finance for other startups through its AI-powered software. Launched in 2022, Truewind is part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2023 batch and has been designed with the unique needs of startups in mind. The team currently consists of 12 members and is led by Group Partner Brad Flora.

Their mission? To eliminate the common headaches associated with bookkeeping by leveraging AI—specifically, GPT-3—to grasp the context only founders truly understand. This means that accounting becomes not only more accurate but also far less tedious.

Truewind offers a suite of services that includes reliable bookkeeping, detailed financial modeling, and a digital staff accountant that operates round the clock. With over 500 five-star reviews, their platform promises features that minimize errors, standardize the reconciliation process, and automate a variety of accounting tasks. The AI capabilities allow for faster bank categorization, transaction absorption, and significant reductions in reconciliation times, which are particularly beneficial for finance teams with tight budgets and ambitions to scale quickly.

For those who have previously used Bench or similar accounting platforms, Truewind offers seamless integrations and support aimed at easing the transition. Their website serves as a hub for potential customers to explore different features, pricing plans, and user testimonials.

If you’re part of a startup and find traditional bookkeeping too cumbersome or error-prone, Truewind could be the tech-savvy solution you didn’t know you needed. To find out more about their offerings or to schedule a demo, you can visit their website at [truewind.ai](https://www.truewind.ai/).
